text: (ehet ovun samaga) kesē nam (givisum) tibiya hækida? ovunva oba jayagrahaṇaya kaḷahot nam, oba (ovunṭa) gnātīn yannada, (obaṭada,ovunṭada atarē æti) givisumada gaṇan gannēma næta. tamangē kaṭa (uttaraya) magin (pamaṇak) obava tṛptiyaṭa pat karannāha. namut ovungē hṛdayan nam, (obagen) ǣt vannāha. ovungen væḍideneku pāpatarayan vaśayenma siṭinnāha
